TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase

summary.span: 表示显示字符串值的 Windows 数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays string values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件显示从所选的单个字符串值通过单击向上或向下按钮控件的集合。A control displays a single string value that is selected from an collection by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 用户还可以输入文本在控件中，除非属性设置为`true`（中键入的字符串必须匹配要接受的集合中的项）。The user can also enter text in the control, unless the property is set to `true` (the string typed in must match an item in the collection to be accepted). 选择某个项后，对象转换为一个字符串值，以便它可以显示数字显示框中。When an item is selected, the object is converted to a string value so it can be displayed in the spin box. 若要创建的对象中显示的集合控件，可以添加或删除的项分别通过使用和方法。To create a collection of objects to display in the control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the and methods. 可以调用此事件处理程序，如按钮的事件。This can be called in an event handler, such as the event of a button. 可以通过设置按字母顺序排序的对象集合属性设置为`true`。The object collection can be sorted alphabetically by setting the property to `true`. 当属性设置为`true`，如果滚动过去的最后一个则在集合中，第一个对象，则列表将分别开始的第一个或最后一个对象，似乎在连续列表中的滚动。When the property is set to `true`, if you scroll past the last or first object in the collection, the list will start over with the first or last object respectively and appear to roll in a continuous list. 当或调用方法时，在代码中或通过单击向上或向下按钮，调用来更新控件的新字符串。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, is called to update the control with the new string. 如果设置为`true`，与之前更新控件的文本显示集合中的值之一匹配的字符串。If is set to `true`, the string is matched to one of the values in the collection prior to updating the control's text display. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始将基于 app.config 文件包含以下条目时系统 DPI 设置调整控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

para.span: 重写时派生类中不应调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DownButton() cil managed

summary.span: 显示对象集合中的下一项。

span.span: Displays the next item in the object collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你移动通过中的项集合控件使用向下按钮，最终将到达集合中的最后一项。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the down button, you will eventually reach the last item in the collection. 如果继续，并设置为`true`，列表将从集合中的第一项重新开始，似乎是连续。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the first item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 当使用向上按钮集合中移动时，也会发生此行为。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the up button.

summary.span: 分配给数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）的对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects assigned to the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
A that contains an collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以构建并提供给两种方式的控制。The collection can be built and made available to the control in two ways. 可以向集合添加项，通过使用或方法。You can add items to the collection by using the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，则控件选择的字符开始的列表中的项目。If the property is set to `true`, the control chooses the item on the list that begins with the character. 如果集合中的多个项以使用相同的字符，控件选择从当前所选的位置开始的类型化字符开始的下一项。If more than one item in the collection starts with the same character, the control selects the next item that begins with the typed character, starting from the currently selected position. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置选定项的索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the index value of the selected item.

value.span: 选定项的从零开始的索引值。

span.span: The zero-based index value of the selected item.
The default value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 中当前所选集合中包含的项的索引值。The property holds the index value of the item in the collection that is currently selected in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 收集项可以是重新分配新的索引值，如果属性已从`false`到`true`。Collection items can be reassigned new index values if the property has been changed from `false` to `true`. 为集合重新已按字母顺序排序，项将分配一个新的索引值。As the collection is re-sorted alphabetically, the items will be assigned a new index value. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户在数字显示框中，输入项，或如果已不选定任何项，值将为默认值为-1。If the user has entered an item in the spin box, or if no item has been selected, the value will be the default value, -1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than the default, -1.
-or-
The assigned value is greater than the count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置此属性时，验证的值是一个集合中的项和属性设置为适当的索引值。When this property is set, the value is validated to be one of the items in the collection, and the property is set to the appropriate index value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关事件的发生，由用户键入一个新值或单击控件的向上或向下按钮，可以在代码中，已更改的属性。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by the user typing in a new value or clicking the control's up or down buttons. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DomainUpDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DomainUpDown1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpButton() cil managed

span.span: Displays the previous item in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你移动通过中的项集合控件使用向上按钮，最终将到达集合中的第一项。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the up button, you will eventually reach the first item in the collection. 如果继续，并设置为`true`，列表将从集合中的最后一项重新开始，似乎是连续。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the last item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 当使用向下按钮的集合中移动时，也会发生此行为。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the down button.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void UpdateEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 更新数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中的文本以显示选定项。

span.span: Updates the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to display the selected item.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户继续滚动时超过了列表的末尾，项的集合是否继续第一项或最后一项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection of items continues to the first or last item if the user continues past the end of the list.

value.span: 如果用户到达集合的开始或末尾时列表重新开始，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list starts again when the user reaches the beginning or end of the collection; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，如果您访问集合中的最后一项并继续，则列表将使用的第一项重新开始，似乎是连续。When the property is set to `true`, if you reach the last item in the collection and continue, the list will start over with the first item and appear to be continuous. 按相反的顺序也适用这种行为。This behavior works in reverse as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置它的一些属性并创建数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 中显示的字符串的集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 该代码假定， ，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 可以在文本框中输入一个字符串，并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性，并观察在数字显示框中的项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box.
